alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN BRADFORD...NORTHEASTERN ALACHUA...WEST CENTRAL PUTNAM AND SOUTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 747 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Melrose, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and exccessive cloud- to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starke, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Melrose Landing, Lake Geneva, Sampson, Waldo, Hampton, Brooker, and Putnam Hall. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
